text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Arconada | nickname = | settlement_type = Municipality and town | image_flag = | image_seal = Escudo de Arconada (Palencia).jpg | image_skyline = Iglesia parroquial de Santa María en Arconada, Palencia, España.JPG | image_map = | map_caption = | image_caption = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Spain | subdivision_type1 = Autonomous community | subdivision_name1 = Castile and León | subdivision_type2 = Province | subdivision_name2 = Palencia | subdivision_type3 = Comarca | subdivision_name3 = El Cerrato | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 34449 | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_magnitude = | area_total_km2 = 19.4 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_m = 828 | population_note = | population_as_of = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | coordinates = | website = http://arconada.es | footnotes = |}} Arconada is a municipality found in the province of Palencia in the autonomous community of Castile and León in Spain. == Sources == Category:Municipalities in Castile and León Category:Settlements in Palencia
